title: Take Action: Stop Lumad Killings in the Southern Philippines (United Church of Canada)
text: ( Source : United Church of Canada ) Indigenous peoples in Mindanao , Southern Philippines (collective called ' Lumad ') are under systematic attack by the Philippine military and paramilitary groups. The attacks involve intense military
